entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW AND FREEZING DRIZZLE IN THE MORNING, THEN SNOW LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS AROUND 15

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 50

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
